creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: first section has six bold regularly-space characters and three red seals; following section has looser calligraphy in short vertical lines; smaller looping text following
text: Qin Guan (Shaoyou, 1049-c.1100) was a Chinese poet and author of this ode tobamboo, a plant that was respected by Chinese scholar-sages for bending but not breaking as well as perseverance through winter.
title: Qin Guan's Ink Bamboo Song
